early.description: Born on a ship harboring smugglers, your earliest memories are of secret compartments and whispered plans.
You learned to pick pockets in the bustling black markets, honing your dexterity and stealth.
Witnessing a deal gone wrong, you narrowly escaped a violent crackdown by corporate enforcers.
A seasoned pirate took you under their wing, teaching you the basics of navigation and evasion.
You stowed away on a freighter to avoid capture, surviving by your wits and agility.
An injury during a botched theft left you with a scar and a lesson in caution.
You mastered the art of lockpicking, gaining access to places others couldn't reach.
Growing up around rough characters, you learned to fight dirty to survive.
You discovered hidden passages within your colony, using them to move undetected.
A close call with a xenomorph taught you the value of speed over strength.
You helped smuggle contraband goods, learning the routes and methods to avoid detection.
Betrayed by a friend over loot, you developed trust issues but also a keen sense for deceit.
You found a malfunctioning drone and repurposed it for your own needs, displaying ingenuity.
Escaping a corporate raid, you navigated through tight ventilation shafts to freedom.
You honed your skills in zero-gravity environments, becoming adept at spacewalks and EVA maneuvers.
An old spacer taught you the secrets of celestial navigation, sparking a love for the stars.
You participated in street races, pushing the limits of speed and reflexes.

mid.description: You successfully led a small crew on a hijacking mission, showcasing leadership and daring.
Captured by corporate forces, you orchestrated a daring escape, solidifying your reputation.
You acquired a stolen ship, learning its ins and outs to stay one step ahead of pursuers.
A heist went wrong, resulting in the loss of a crew member; you carry the weight of responsibility.
You navigated through a hazardous asteroid field to evade capture, demonstrating exceptional piloting skills.
An encounter with a rival pirate crew led to a fierce battle; you emerged victorious but wounded.
You decoded encrypted corporate communications, gaining valuable intel for future raids.
Forming an uneasy alliance with a smuggler, you expanded your operations but faced new risks.
You developed a network of contacts in the black market, enhancing your resources and influence.
A close brush with a xenomorph infestation forced you to abandon a lucrative haul.
You learned advanced combat techniques from a veteran pirate, increasing your effectiveness in raids.
A betrayal within your crew led to a mutiny; you had to fight to regain control.
You orchestrated a heist on a corporate vault, gaining wealth but attracting significant attention.
An injury forced you to rely more on cunning and agility rather than brute strength.
You discovered an old star chart leading to uncharted territories, sparking a desire for exploration.
Facing a moral dilemma, you chose to save a civilian vessel instead of completing your mission.
You developed a signature tactic or maneuver that became feared among your enemies.

late.description: You became the captain of your own ship, leading a crew of seasoned pirates.
An alliance with a notorious pirate lord offered greater power but at the cost of your autonomy.
You infiltrated a high-security corporate facility to retrieve valuable data, pushing your skills to the limit.
A tragic loss during a mission led you to question the pirate life, contemplating a different path.
You orchestrated a massive raid on a corporate convoy, striking a significant blow against them.
Facing betrayal from within, you rooted out spies and reasserted control over your crew.
You encountered an alien artifact that granted strange abilities or knowledge, altering your perspective.
A confrontation with a corporate nemesis became personal, fueling a desire for vengeance.
You negotiated a truce between rival pirate factions, showcasing leadership and diplomacy.
An opportunity to go legitimate arose, challenging your identity and loyalties.
You led an assault on a xenomorph-infested derelict, seeking valuable salvage but risking everything.
A prophecy or vision hinted at a greater destiny, influencing your decisions and actions.
You discovered a mole within your organization, forcing you to make hard choices about trust and justice.
A close ally betrayed you, leading to a fierce rivalry that consumed much of your focus.
You found a map to a legendary treasure or lost technology, setting you on a perilous quest.
Facing a no-win scenario, you made a sacrifice that saved your crew but cost you dearly.
You became a legend among pirates, with stories of your exploits spreading far and wide.
